data.title: Fire Damage, Water Damage, & Mold Restoration in Auburn Hills
data.meta_description: ATI Restoration's full service fire damage, water damage, and mold restoration team proudly serves homes and businesses in Auburn Hills, MI.
data.text:
We offer a 24-Hour Emergency Response service, enabling us to dispatch an experienced team to your commercial or residential property right away to assess the damage and start the remediation process. We are dedicated to minimizing further damage to your property and getting you back to normal in the shortest amount of time possible.

Helping You Rebuild After Fire & Smoke Damage in Auburn Hills

Fire damage goes beyond what you can visibly see. Smoke and soot can infiltrate various nooks and crannies of your property, affecting the structure, contents, and furnishings. Water damage from firefighting efforts can also have lingering effects if not properly addressed.

ATI Restoration offers a full range of fire and smoke damage restoration services tailored to the local needs of Auburn Hills and its surrounding communities, including:

Emergency Board Ups

Water Extraction & Mitigation

Dehumidification

Structural Decontamination

Deodorization & Soot Removal

Painting

Drywall Repair & Replacement

HVAC Restoration & Air Duct Cleaning

Contents Cleaning & Restoration

Debris Removal

Fast-Track Reconstruction

The road to recovery post-fire often involves complicated insurance claims and local permitting hurdles. Our Fast-Track Reconstruction protocol allows us to cut through red tape, facilitating a quicker return to normalcy. Our experienced team—composed of licensed professionals in various trades such as electrical work, carpentry, and painting—further ensures that each project meets the highest standards and is fully compliant with local Auburn Hills codes and regulations.

If you find yourself dealing with the aftermath of a fire, ATI Auburn Hills is just a call away. Our comprehensive services and community-focused approach make us the go-to choice for all your fire and smoke damage restoration needs, every hour or the day, every day of the year.

Our technicians have completed OSHA’s Hazardous Waste Operations and Emergency Response (HAZWOPER) certification, enabling them to address clean water (Category 1), gray water (Category 2), and black water (Category 3) safely and efficiently. This advanced training ensures we respond appropriately to whatever type of water intrusion is impacting your home or business. Whether it’s a flooded basement after a rainstorm, appliance leaks, or sewage backups, we are equipped with state-of-the-art technology to address all kinds of water damage.

Water Removal in Auburn Hills

Before beginning the water extraction process, our team performs extensive diagnostics, including moisture mapping and water leak detection. This enables us to identify hidden pockets of water in your structure, as well as in furniture and other contents. Once identified, we employ industrial-grade dryers, air movers, and dehumidifiers to eliminate all traces of water and moisture from your property.

The type and extent of water damage determine our approach to remediation. Particularly dangerous is Category 3 water damage, which poses serious health hazards and must be dealt with swiftly. Available 24/7/365, ATI Auburn Hills is ready to dispatch a crew to your property to quickly restore a healthy and sound environment.

Water Damage Cleanup in Auburn Hills

After water and moisture are removed, the cleanup phase can begin. Our HAZWOPER-certified technicians offer a comprehensive set of services to restore your home or business:

Debris Removal

Structural Decontamination

Mold Remediation

Odor Treatment & Deodorization

Documents Drying

Contents Cleaning & Restoration

Sewage Cleanup (When Needed)

Water Damage Restoration in Auburn Hills

The final step is to restore and renovate your water-damaged property. At ATI Auburn Hills, we are committed to the highest standard of quality. Our services range from minor repairs to a complete structural overhaul involving new plumbing installations, repainting walls, replacing carpets, and much more. Our team’s knowledge spans various building trades, including plumbing, electrical work, carpentry, and more. This ensures a thorough restoration process that covers all bases.

When disaster strikes, timely intervention is crucial. Call us for rapid, professional, and comprehensive water damage restoration services. Committed to quality, community, and swift action, ATI Auburn Hills is just a phone call away—every day of the year.

View Less

One frequent problem that arises in homes and businesses alike is mold growth, which can occur within 24 hours of water intrusion. Swift remediation is essential for keeping your home or business safe. ATI Auburn Hills is available 24/7/365 to help.

We partner with industrial hygienists right here in Metro Detroit to identify the species present in your property. This allows us to determine the most effective mold remediation strategy for your property with services including:

Removal of Affected Materials

Cleaning & Disinfection

Drying & Dehumidification

Structural Decontamination

HVAC & Air Duct Restoration

Repairs & Restoration

Mold isn’t just an eyesore or a threat to your property value; it’s a potential health hazard as well. Those with pre-existing conditions like asthma or allergies can suffer exacerbated symptoms, while even healthy individuals may experience respiratory issues. With our 24-Hour Emergency Response service, we can have a crew of certified and experienced technicians to your property to address mold intrusion without delay.

Every residential and commercial reconstruction project is unique. Our talented professionals are skilled in a host of different trades, allowing us to rebuild properties much faster than smaller companies by keeping all aspects of the job in-house. We’re also able to streamline the permitting process and handle insurance paperwork, allowing us to save you time, money, and hassle. We call this unique approach our Fast-Track Reconstruction protocol.

Reconstruction services provided by ATI Auburn Hills include:

Board Ups

Structural Repairs

Demolition & Debris Removal

Lead & Asbestos Abatement

Vandalism Restoration

One of the most traumatic aspects of facing a disaster is the feeling of being alone in your time of need. At ATI Auburn Hills, you’re not alone. We offer 24-Hour Emergency Response services, enabling us to quickly mobilize and dispatch a crew to your property at any time. We promptly evaluate the damage, discuss the scope of the repairs, and set your property on the fast track to recovery.

Our team approaches every project with the utmost compassion, personalized attention, empathy, and care. We are committed to doing the right thing at all times—that’s one of our core values. Don’t leave your reconstruction needs to chance. Trust ATI Auburn Hills to provide quality, expedited services that prioritize your needs from start to finish.
